description: An HTML file that includes JavaScript code defining a Calculator class extending Service, which registers 'add' and 'sub' methods, and initializes a ServiceManager to connect and register the service.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A class extending Service that provides 'add' and 'sub' methods, registered in the service framework.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Calculates the sum of parameters and resolves the promise with the result.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Calculates the difference between two parameters and resolves the promise with the result.
